CANNOT_ADD.description: You're not able to add a pokelist at the moment

ALREADY_EXISTS.description: The pokelist you are trying to add already exists

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to add a pokelist

single.description: The pokelist you are looking for does not exist

multiple.description: The pokelists you are looking for do not exist

NOT_REACHABLE.description: The pokelists are not available at the moment

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to access pokelists

CANNOT_UPDATE.description: You're not able to update a pokelist at the moment

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to update a pokelist

CANNOT_DELETE.description: The pokelist you are trying to delete cannot be deleted

PERMISSION_DENIED.description: You do not have permission to delete a pokelist

WENT_WRONG.description: Something went wrong while processing your request
